translation.en: [yelling] Oh, come on, man! I got kids, man.
translation.it: Ma andiamo... Io ho dei figli! È Natale!

translation.en: -It's Christmas! -And I feel you!
translation.it: Ma andiamo... Io ho dei figli! È Natale! E ti capisco, da uomo nero a uomo nero...

translation.en: Black man on black man. Look... [slaps]
translation.it: E ti capisco, da uomo nero a uomo nero...

translation.en: The holidays is coming up, I get that, and it's hard on everybody.
translation.it: È il periodo delle feste, ed è dura per tutti, lo capisco.

translation.en: I mean, not me. 'Cause I'm cashing in. Big time.
translation.it: Non per me, certo. Perché incasso, e alla grande.

translation.en: You really gonna look us in our eye and say that? You gonna fix your mouth
translation.it: Stai dicendo sul serio? Osi guardarci negli occhi e dirci una cosa simile?

translation.en: to say that after we met today? You know why we met, Marshall!
translation.it: Osi guardarci negli occhi e dirci una cosa simile? Sai a che serviva la riunione di oggi? Vedi questo?

translation.en: You see this right here?
translation.it: Sai a che serviva la riunione di oggi? Vedi questo?

translation.en: This is a plan. Know what's in it? -[Marshall] What-- -Graphs! Pie charts!
translation.it: È un piano. Sai di che parla? Grafici! Diagrammi!

translation.en: A proposal to own part of this station, Marshall!
translation.it: Una proposta per acquisire parte della radio!

translation.en: And I understand that, [stammers] but you...
[stammering] This... These... Are these the numbers?
Oh, my God.
I'm so mad y'all didn't become part owners before the deal went through.
translation.it: Mi rompe che non siate diventati comproprietari prima.

translation.en: -I mean, look at this. These numbers... -Okay, okay.
At least we got our bonuses to look forward to.
[stammers] Got your what?
[stammers] Our bonuses.
-WMLE does the bonuses. -Oh! Oh, your bonuses. Oh...
translation.it: - WMLE dà gli assegni bonus. - Ah, i bonus...

translation.en: Yeah... about that...
I don't believe this. How they gon' do this to us?
translation.it: Non ci credo! Come possono farci questo?

translation.en: [Roxy] Exactly. This is ridiculous.
[Rush] H-how did she even get the position? [Roxy] I should've seen this coming.
translation.it: - Come ha ottenuto quel posto? - Dovevo aspettarmelo.

translation.en: [Rush] Hey, I guarantee you, they gon' regret it.
translation.it: Ti garantisco che se ne pentiranno.

translation.en: I guarantee you they gon'-- they gon' be callin' me back.
translation.it: Ti garantisco che se ne pentiranno. Mi richiameranno.

translation.en: -Oh, this is painful, Roxy. -I know, but--
translation.it: - È doloroso, Roxy. - Lo so, ma...

translation.en: No, no, this changes too much.
This changes too much.
When I walk into that booth, and I settle into my chair, and I lean in...
translation.it: Quando mi siedo in cabina, e mi chino in avanti...

translation.en: I smell the metal of that microphone...
and it gets me going.
The second that mic is hot, we are live, and that is my moment to connect with my people.
translation.it: Quando è tutto pronto e andiamo in onda... È allora che sento il legame con la gente.

translation.en: And you might think that I'm freestyling, but no, my message is clear,
translation.it: Magari pensi che improvvisi, ma il messaggio è chiaro

translation.en: and it is from my heart.
Every... single show, I try to nail that.
translation.it: È quello che cerco di fare in ogni singola trasmissione.

translation.en: Every single day, for all these years and to just...
translation.it: Ogni giorno, per tutti questi anni e...

translation.en: To just have it yanked away from you like...
translation.it: Quando te lo strappano via così...

translation.en: It just feels like I'm losing a body part. -[wind, vehicles whirring]
translation.it: È come perdere una parte del tuo corpo.

translation.en: And I-- I'm not ready to say goodbye. I'm not.
translation.it: E non sono pronto a dirgli addio, no.

translation.en: Listen...
we've been knocked down before.
We just got to find a way to get off the pavement, that's all.
translation.it: Dobbiamo solo trovare un modo per rialzarci.

translation.en: What am I going to tell the kids, though? Okay, Christmas is around the corner!
translation.it: Che dirò ai bambini? Natale è praticamente dietro l'angolo.

translation.en: Man, those little faces. They just want so much.
translation.it: Quei faccini... Vogliono così tante cose.

translation.en: I mean expect so much. Not so much expect, as demand.
translation.it: Si aspettano così tante cose. Cioè... lo pretendono.

translation.en: They threaten me, even. [stammers] I tell you, the twins pulled a knife.
translation.it: Mi minacciano. Le gemelle hanno sfoderato un coltello.

translation.en: Hey, this is going to work out.
It is.
'Tis the season, right? Just got to have a little faith.
translation.it: È Natale, no? Devi solo avere un po' di fede.

translation.en: Do you really believe that?
Isn't that what people are supposed to say during Christmas?
translation.it: Non è quello che si dovrebbe dire a Natale?

translation.en: Come on. I'll drop you home. Come on.
translation.it: Dai, ti do un passaggio fino a casa.

translation.en: -Okay, girls. -[bags rustling]
-Let me help you, Daddy. -Oh, thank you, baby girl. Here you go.
translation.it: - Ti aiuto io, papà. - Grazie, piccola.

translation.en: That one, there. Don't forget that one.
Good looking out.
[Evie] What kind of snack are you making for us? [Gabby] I want pizza.
translation.it: - Che spuntino ci prepari? - Io voglio la pizza!

translation.en: [Rush] Thanks for--
Oh, no. What am I going to do about the pool?
translation.it: Oh, no. E ora come faccio per la piscina?

translation.en: [Gabby] No worries, Mya had a "come-to-Jesus" with Daniels.
translation.it: Non c'è problema. Mya ha cambiato il programma.

translation.en: Straight up, she lit a fire under him.
But there's going to be something called OT.
[Rush] Really? Lacrosse?
-[Evie] Yes, Daddy. -[Gabby] It builds team work.
translation.it: - Sì, papà. - Sviluppa il lavoro di squadra.

translation.en: Yeah, but these things cost a lot of money.
Yeah, we're really bad at it, too.
translation.it: E non siamo per niente brave.

translation.en: Well, you should give it up! Only rich people play lacrosse.
translation.it: Smettetela! Solo i ricchi giocano a lacrosse.

translation.en: -I know. -Right?
-[descending footsteps] -[Mya] We're home!
Oh, Pops, you're home. I've been waiting. I got the email.
translation.it: Sei a casa! Ti stavo aspettando. Ho ricevuto l'e-mail.

translation.en: -Oh, you got the email. -[Jamal] Yeah.
-Oh, my God, you got the email. -[Evie] Open it! I want to see it!
[Gabby, high pitch] Hey. Oh, my goodness!
Gabby, take my phone.
We need to memorialize my triumph. Dad, get behind me for the reaction shot.
translation.it: Commemoriamo il mio trionfo. Papà, vieni qui, così si vede la tua reazione.

translation.en: -[giggling] -Yes.
All right. I waited to open this together.
One for the Jamal Williams future archives.
translation.it: Per l'archivio futuro di Jamal Williams.

translation.en: Definitely wanna film both our faces when we find out.
Son, will you open the email? You're killing me, just open the email.
translation.it: Perché non la apri? Mi stai uccidendo. Aprila e basta.

translation.en: Okay, I love that you're as excited as I am.
translation.it: Mi piace che sei emozionato quanto me.

translation.en: -[Rush] Hey, Jamal. -Yeah.
It is okay if you don't get in. Okay?
translation.it: Non fa niente se non ti accettano, ok?

translation.en: I didn't go away to college, and I don't want you to think of it as a failure.
translation.it: Io non sono andato al college. Non devi considerarlo un fallimento.

translation.en: I want you to think of it as carrying on that family tradition, right?
translation.it: Sarebbe più una continuazione della tradizione di famiglia.

translation.en: -'Cause that tradition-- -I got in!
-[Mya gasps] -I'm in!
-Who's going to Harvard? Me! That's right. -[Rush] Yeah.
translation.it: Chi è che va ad Harvard? Proprio io!

translation.en: -Man, you must be so pumped for me. -Oh, I am, of course, I mean... [chuckles]
translation.it: - Sei gasatissimo per me, vero? - Certo, insomma...

translation.en: It's great if you're into that Ivy League-y sort of vibe, you know?
translation.it: È mitico che tu sia entrato nella Ivy League, no?

translation.en: -Yay! -[Rush] You know what you should do?
You should check out my Alma Mater. For safety.
translation.it: Dovresti vedere la mia Alma Mater. Per sicurezza.

translation.en: The Queensborough Community College? Instead of Harvard?
translation.it: Il Queensborough Community College? Invece di Harvard?

translation.en: -[Jamal] Oh, you are hilarious. -I got you.
translation.it: - Mi fai morire dal ridere. - Papà fa la battute!

translation.en: Oh, man. And look, no worries. I checked and paying a little extra,
translation.it: E, guarda, se pago un po' di più, anche se sono una matricola,

translation.en: a freshman can park a car on campus.
translation.it: ho un posto auto al campus.

translation.en: -There's no car. There's no car. -Yeah, yeah. It's not December 25th yet.
translation.it: - Non c'è nessuna auto. - Sì, sì, non è ancora il 25 dicembre...

translation.en: We're taking the Jamal Williams experience to Ivy League!
translation.it: Portiamo l'esperienza Jamal Williams alla Ivy League!

translation.en: -[girls, together] Yay! -[laughing]
You're too young to be referring to yourself as a brand. -You know that? -[Jamal] You do it all the time.
translation.it: - Sei un po' giovane per crearti un brand. - Tu lo fai sempre.

translation.en: [kids chanting] Harvard! Harvard! Harvard!
Why did I have to have smart kids? Dumb kids are way cheaper.
translation.it: Perché ho figli intelligenti? Quelli stupidi sono più economici.

translation.en: Why aren't you sharing in that child's joy?
'Cause it's over. It's all over. We are ruined. Ruined!
translation.it: Perché è finita. Siamo rovinati. Rovinati!

translation.en: It's a dark day, Aunt Jo. It's dark. It's a dark day. I don't know what happened.
translation.it: È un triste giorno, zia Jo. Tristissimo. Non so cosa sia successo.

translation.en: I ain't even see it coming.
Are you done? For whatever that was?
translation.it: Hai finito? Ma che ti prende?

translation.en: The radio station sold.
Job gone.
No more radio. It's done.
-You've saved. I know you've saved. -How, Aunt Jo?
translation.it: - Avrai dei risparmi da parte. - Per cosa, zia Jo?

translation.en: The bills, they get higher every month. We got fresh bills!
translation.it: Le bollette aumentano ogni mese. Abbiamo tante cose da pagare!

translation.en: Jamal had to go to Costa Rica to volunteer to dig wells,
translation.it: Jamal doveva andare in Costa Rica a scavare pozzi,

translation.en: so that they could have "clean water."
Mya's platinum status on Saks.com, and the twins, there's two of them!
translation.it: La carta platino di Mya su Saks.com e le gemelle, che sono in due!

translation.en: And they all go to private school. Not to mention, it's Christmas.
translation.it: E frequentano scuole private. E poi è Natale!

translation.en: You spoil those kids.
They snap their fingers, and you open your wallet.
translation.it: Basta un cenno e tu tiri fuori il portafogli.

translation.en: I've been trying to be both parents.
translation.it: Cerco di essere entrambi i genitori,

translation.en: Give them everything they wanted because I can't be everything,
translation.it: di dare loro tutto ciò che vogliono, perché non ci riesco.

translation.en: and yeah, okay, [stammering] maybe I gave a little too much.
translation.it: E magari do loro un po' troppe cose...

translation.en: You think?
That life's about to change.
-Straight up. -Oh, yeah.
We're about to make some changes around here.
translation.it: Stiamo per apportare dei cambiamenti qui.

translation.en: -Snap the whip. -[chuckles]
Things about to get tight. They about to get lean.
translation.it: Dovremo iniziare a tagliare. Siamo a corto di soldi.

translation.en: These kids gonna be giving up a whole lot. How do I tell them that?
translation.it: Dovranno rinunciare a tante cose. Come faccio a dirglielo?

translation.en: I don't wanna tell them that. Aunt Jo, please.
translation.it: Non voglio dirglielo. Ti prego, zia Jo...

translation.en: You tell them and bake 'em a pie, okay? I'mma go lay down.
translation.it: Diglielo tu e prepara una crostata. Io vado a riposare.

translation.en: This is not a pie situation, son.
translation.it: Qui non è questione di crostate, figliolo.

translation.en: Remember what your granddaddy said.
It's not what you got, it's what you got around you.
translation.it: Non conta cosa possiedi. Conta che cosa hai intorno a te.

translation.en: [whispering] What about Christmas for the kids?
translation.it: E il Natale per i bambini?

translation.en: It's going to be all right.
Have a little faith.
Everybody keeps telling me that.
[Rush] That was the Everly Brothers, "Christmas Eve Can Kill You."
translation.it: Quelli erano gli Everly Brothers, con "La vigilia di Natale può uccidervi".

translation.en: Stay tuned for a word from our sponsors.
translation.it: Restate sintonizzati per i nostri sponsor.

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
Rush out.
Forever.
-[smooth jazz Christmas music playing] -[Janella] Should I call 911?
Rush's mental state doesn't seem stable.
translation.it: Rush sembra un po' fuori di testa.

translation.en: That's not the note we should have gone out on for your last show.
translation.it: Non dovevamo concludere l'ultimo show in quel tono.

translation.en: You want fans to follow you wherever you go.
translation.it: I fan devono seguirti ovunque tu vada.

translation.en: Not follow you off a cliff.
You got to rise above this nonsense.
translation.it: Non devi scendere a questi livelli.

translation.en: Be Rush.
Be my star.
Well, if I'm going down in flames...
translation.it: Beh, se devo colare a picco...

translation.en: I'm glad you're the one burning with me.
translation.it: sono felice che annegherai con me.

translation.en: -We're poor? -[funky music playing]
-Did I say we were poor? -But you don't have a job.
translation.it: - Ho detto che siamo poveri? - Ma non hai un lavoro.

translation.en: And you pretty much broadcasted that to everyone.
Brilliant!
-So, no horse? -It's mini-sized.
None of that is happening, okay?
In fact, there's a whole lot of not happening
-that's about to start happening. -[groans]
translation.it: - stanno per non esistere. - Nemmeno Harvard?

translation.en: -Wait, is Harvard not happening? -I want it to.
translation.it: - stanno per non esistere. - Nemmeno Harvard? Voglio dirti di sì.

translation.en: -So, what's the plan? -I don't know yet, son.
translation.it: - Qual è il piano? - Ancora non lo so.

translation.en: -Great. -Great.
Hey, give me some time.
-Unbelievable. -So bad.
-[retreating footsteps] -[Gabby] This is worse than bad!
[Rush] Y'all sitting all off in the bleachers -like y'all can't hear the conversation? -[Roxy sighs]
translation.it: Vi sedete tutti in tribuna come se non poteste parlarne qui?

translation.en: Looks like you have plans for a holly jolly Christmas.
translation.it: Vedo che hai dei piani per un Natale allegro e festoso.

translation.en: [sighs] Rush, we need to talk.
-Did it come through yet? -It's getting close. [exhales]
-[Aunt Jo] Did you tell him yet? -I don't have all the details.
translation.it: - Gliel'hai già detto? - Non ho tutti i dettagli.

translation.en: You know, I kinda like and dislike the fact that y'all are so close.
translation.it: Mi piace e non mi piace il fatto che siate così legate.

translation.en: -Mostly dislike. -[Roxy] Okay.
Rush, what if I told you that Krush BQL is for sale?
translation.it: Rush, e se ti dicessi che Krush BQL è in vendita?

translation.en: Well, great, more people losing their jobs.
translation.it: Bene, altra gente che perde il lavoro.

translation.en: No, it closed down a couple months ago.
translation.it: No, ha chiuso un paio di mesi fa.

translation.en: The building is for sale. The station is up for grabs.
translation.it: L'edificio è in vendita. La radio è disponibile.

translation.en: So, WBQL is for sale. What's for dinner?
translation.it: WBQL è in vendita. Che c'è per cena?

translation.en: I figured you'd make it after you finish all your decoration.
translation.it: Pensavo che avresti cucinato tu dopo gli addobbi.

translation.en: Hey! Listen to me. We should buy that station.
With what, Roxy? My megawatt smile?
translation.it: Con cosa, Roxy? Il mio sorriso smagliante?

translation.en: With money!
I built up a pretty hefty 401k.
translation.it: Ho un bel fondo pensione da parte.

translation.en: You'd put that up for me?
For us.
I'm touched, Roxy, for real.
But it'd take a much bigger Christmas miracle than that.
translation.it: Ma ci vorrebbe un miracolo natalizio ben più grande.

translation.en: [Aunt Jo] Is this big enough?
That's sweet, Aunt Jo. But I don't think your little coffee can stash
translation.it: Che dolce... Ma gli spiccioli che hai nascosto qui

translation.en: is going to help much.
[chuckles] There's $45,000 in there.
You wouldn't happen to have more of these stashed under the house, huh?
translation.it: Non è che ne hai un altro paio in giro?

translation.en: Oh, no, honey, that's my mad money.
translation.it: No, tesoro, quelli sono i soldi per le emergenze.

translation.en: My investment manager takes care of all the big stuff.
translation.it: Il mio consulente finanziario si occupa del resto.

translation.en: Wait, does everyone else have money stashed away but me?
translation.it: Hanno tutti soldi da parte tranne me?

translation.en: 'Cause my money just seems to fly away before I can grab it.
translation.it: Perché i miei soldi spariscono in un baleno.

translation.en: -Rush. -Yes?
You got your first break at that station, right?
translation.it: Hai raggiunto la fama con quella stazione radio, no?

translation.en: -[sighs] -Let's get back to where we started. Isn't that what we always dreamed of?
translation.it: Torniamo agli albori. Non è quello che sognavamo?

translation.en: That station is way down the dial, Roxy.
translation.it: È una radio poco nota, Roxy.

translation.en: Yeah, but I miss the time when we ruled the airwaves.
translation.it: Mi mancano i tempi in cui comandavamo l'etere.

translation.en: We just got kicked off the airwaves last week.
We could be a part of the community again, right?
translation.it: Potremmo tornare a far parte della comunità, no?

translation.en: Remember block parties, and pop-up concerts?
translation.it: Ricordi le feste di quartiere e i concerti improvvisati?

translation.en: Charity drives?
We could sponsor Christmas dinner at First Community Church.
translation.it: Sponsorizziamo la cena natalizia per la chiesa.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Come on, we used to live for that.
And the WMLE suits shut all of that down, and we can bring it all back.
translation.it: WMLE ha chiuso tutto, ma noi possiamo riportarlo indietro.

translation.en: -[serene instrumentals] -Can't you see it? We get to play the music we want.
translation.it: Non vedi? Possiamo mandare la musica che vogliamo.

translation.en: We get to play the music we want.
It's like the universe is screaming at us right now.
translation.it: È come se l'universo ci stesse urlando contro.

translation.en: Let's build Krush BQL back up.
-We'd be taking a huge risk huge. -Huge, yeah.
Risk? Eh... Why don't you let me handle that?
Yeah? Is that a yes?
Yeah?
-Start counting. -Yes!
Oh, it's about to be real merry up in here.
translation.it: Le cose si fanno più liete qui.

translation.en: -[melodic] Rush and Roxy! -[Rush] Hey!
-That's it. -[Rush] Oh!
-[indistinct chatter] -All right. Old school. Never mind.
Listen, hey, I'm seeing a bright star on our horizon.
translation.it: Sentite, vedo una stella luminosa all'orizzonte.

translation.en: -[playful Christmas instrumentals] -An opportunity for all of us.
My old station,
the one that got the Rush engine on the track to begin with, is for sale.
translation.it: quella che ha messo in pista il motore Rush, è in vendita.

translation.en: And Roxy and I are buying it.
translation.it: E io e Roxy la compriamo.

translation.en: Sounds like somebody's spending money we don't have.
translation.it: Qualcuno spende soldi che non abbiamo.

translation.en: Will you hear me out?
I'm going to need all of you.
Even Aunt Jo kicked in a little cash.
translation.it: Anche la zia Jo ha dato dei soldi.

translation.en: -And I know that it's Christmas-- -[Mya] Oh.
I figured Christmas was already off the table.
translation.it: Credevo che il Natale non valesse più.

translation.en: Not necessarily, but there will be some sacrifices.
translation.it: Non è così, ma dovremo fare dei sacrifici.

translation.en: Now, in order for me to come up with my share of the money to buy the station,
translation.it: Per trovare la mia quota per comprare la stazione radio,

translation.en: -I'm going to need to... [muffled speech] -What?
-[Mya] What was that? -I'm sorry, what?
I said, I'm going to need to put the house... [garbling]
-[Gabby] Hmm? -You have to speak louder.
I'm going to need to sell our house.
-Wait, our house? -Oh, snap!
I didn't see homeless on the menu.
I am always going to provide for you kids, okay? [stammering] But let's face it.
translation.it: Ragazzi, cercherò sempre di provvedere a voi. Ma diciamoci la verità.

translation.en: We've gotten a little... What's the word?
translation.it: Siamo diventati un po'... Com'è che si dice?

translation.en: Bougie.
Will you finish eating your pizza, please?
Now, stay with me.
Just stay with me, here. I want you to think big picture, right?
translation.it: Ascoltate. Guardate il quadro d'insieme, ok?

translation.en: This is a better future for all of us. This is our way out of this mess.
translation.it: È un futuro migliore per tutti noi. È un modo per uscire da questo pasticcio.

translation.en: Are you ready?
-We're moving back into our old house. -[record scratch]
-What old house? -The house that you were raised in, son.
translation.it: - Quale casa? - Quella in cui sei cresciuto.

translation.en: -What? -But Auntie Jo lives there now.
translation.it: - Cosa? - Ma ora ci vive la zia Jo.

translation.en: There are five of us.
That is a whole mess of people in that tiny house.
translation.it: È un casino di gente per quella casetta.

translation.en: There can't possibly be enough space.
Listen, as long as we're together, we'll figure it out.
translation.it: Finché siamo insieme, ce la faremo.

translation.en: One bathroom, six people. I rest my case.
translation.it: Un bagno, sei persone... Resto della mia idea.

translation.en: You... Mya, you should be lucky we have this option.
I can't believe this. I am not going back there.
translation.it: Non ci credo. Io lì non ci torno.

translation.en: The decision's already been made.
translation.it: La decisione è già stata presa.

translation.en: And I bet your big picture has me waving goodbye to my future.
translation.it: E nel tuo quadro d'insieme dovrei dire addio al mio futuro.

translation.en: You think this is easy?
I remember you painting daisies all over that mailbox.
translation.it: Ricordo quando dipingevi margherite sulla cassetta postale.

translation.en: Trying to make it look all cheery.
Like we were getting something other than bills. [laughs]
translation.it: Così non pensavamo solo alle bollette.

translation.en: I wish bills were my only problem right now.
translation.it: Magari fossero le bollette il problema...

translation.en: Still holding it down.
[Rush] Ah, man.
Oh, Paula, we had it all.
This little house. You and me.
One bathroom.
A leaky roof.
-Where we got our start. -[chuckles softly]
Moving the kids back in, that's...
that's going to be tough.
-They'll be okay. -[wind whirring] They just need time to adjust.
translation.it: Andrà tutto bene. Hanno solo bisogno di tempo per adattarsi.

translation.en: I thought I made it.
Thought I'd built them a life.
You did.
And you gotta keep chasing those big dreams of yours.
translation.it: Continua a inseguire i tuoi grandi sogni.

translation.en: And not just the station.
translation.it: E non solo per la radio.

translation.en: She's a good woman, Rush.
You're ready.
I don't know what I'm ready for.
Cherish the times that we had, but...
translation.it: Ricorda con affetto la nostra vita,

translation.en: turn the page.
You've still got a lot of life ahead of you.
he opened up all the Christmas presents? [laughing]
translation.it: e aprì tutti i regali di Natale?

translation.en: He would not take off that sapphire necklace I bought you.
translation.it: Non voleva togliersi la collana di zaffiri che ti avevo comprato.

translation.en: Was it you or me who let him wear it to church?
translation.it: Chi di noi due gliel'aveva fatta indossare in chiesa?

translation.en: Paula, is that you? Are you giving me a sign?
